risks.peristiwaRisiko: Kehilangan data customer akibat kerusakan server atau cyberattack
risks.dampakKualitatif: Kehilangan kepercayaan customer, reputasi perusahaan rusak, potensi tuntutan hukum
risks.dampakKuantitatif: Kerugian finansial hingga 2 miliar rupiah, biaya recovery 500 juta rupiah
risks.kontrolEksisting: Backup data harian, redundant server, firewall, antivirus enterprise

risks.peristiwaRisiko: Keterlambatan implementasi sistem ERP karena kompleksitas integrasi
risks.sumberRisiko: Resource constraints, Technical complexity, Scope creep
risks.dampakKualitatif: Delay go-live, impact business operations, customer dissatisfaction
risks.dampakKuantitatif: Penalty 300 juta rupiah, additional resource cost 200 juta rupiah
risks.kontrolEksisting: Project monitoring weekly, milestone tracking, change control process

risks.peristiwaRisiko: Data migration gagal atau data corrupt selama proses migrasi ke ERP baru
risks.sumberRisiko: Data inconsistency, Migration tool limitation, Human error
risks.dampakKualitatif: Business disruption, wrong decision making, operational inefficiency
risks.dampakKuantitatif: Data recovery cost 400 juta rupiah, business downtime loss 600 juta rupiah
risks.kontrolEksisting: Data validation tools, migration testing, rollback procedure

risks.peristiwaRisiko: Resistensi user terhadap sistem baru menyebabkan low adoption rate
risks.sumberRisiko: Change resistance, Insufficient training, Complex user interface
risks.dampakKualitatif: Low productivity, system underutilization, training cost increase
risks.dampakKuantitatif: Additional training cost 150 juta rupiah, productivity loss 300 juta rupiah
risks.kontrolEksisting: User training program, change management, user support helpdesk

risks.peristiwaRisiko: Kegagalan integrasi ERP dengan sistem existing (CRM, accounting, inventory)
risks.sumberRisiko: API incompatibility, Data format mismatch, Legacy system limitation
risks.dampakKualitatif: Manual workaround needed, data silos, operational inefficiency
risks.dampakKuantitatif: Additional integration cost 800 juta rupiah, manual process cost 200 juta/bulan
risks.kontrolEksisting: Integration testing, API documentation, pilot implementation

risks.peristiwaRisiko: Performance sistem lambat saat peak load atau concurrent users tinggi
risks.sumberRisiko: Insufficient server capacity, Database optimization issue, Network bandwidth
risks.dampakKualitatif: User frustration, productivity decrease, system timeout
risks.dampakKuantitatif: Infrastructure upgrade cost 600 juta rupiah, productivity loss 100 juta/bulan
risks.kontrolEksisting: Load testing, server monitoring, database tuning, scalable architecture

risks.peristiwaRisiko: Vendor ERP tidak memberikan support yang memadai atau discontinue product
risks.sumberRisiko: Vendor business issue, Product lifecycle, Support contract limitation
risks.dampakKualitatif: Limited support, security vulnerabilities, forced migration to new system
risks.dampakKuantitatif: Migration cost 3 miliar rupiah, extended support cost 500 juta/tahun
risks.kontrolEksisting: Vendor evaluation, SLA agreement, escrow agreement, alternative vendor assessment

risks.peristiwaRisiko: Sistem ERP tidak memenuhi requirement audit atau regulasi yang berlaku
risks.sumberRisiko: Regulation change, Audit requirement, Data privacy law
risks.dampakKualitatif: Audit finding, regulatory penalty, legal compliance issue
risks.dampakKuantitatif: Compliance cost 200 juta rupiah, potential fine 500 juta rupiah
risks.kontrolEksisting: Compliance review, audit trail, regulatory consultation, documentation

PRJ-002.overallComment: Comprehensive risk assessment with appropriate mitigation strategies for mobile banking security

risks.peristiwaRisiko: Fraud transaksi melalui compromised authentication atau session hijacking
risks.sumberRisiko: Weak authentication, Session vulnerability, Device compromise
risks.dampakKualitatif: Customer loss, regulatory penalty, reputation damage, legal liability
risks.dampakKuantitatif: Fraud loss 5 miliar rupiah, investigation cost 300 juta rupiah, fine 1 miliar rupiah
risks.kontrolEksisting: Multi-factor authentication, biometric, session timeout, device binding, fraud detection
risks.verifierComment: Strong security controls implemented, risk properly mitigated

risks.peristiwaRisiko: Kebocoran data personal customer melalui mobile app vulnerability
risks.sumberRisiko: App vulnerability, Data transmission, Storage security, API security
risks.dampakKualitatif: Privacy violation, customer trust loss, regulatory investigation
risks.dampakKuantitatif: GDPR fine 2 miliar rupiah, remediation cost 500 juta rupiah
risks.kontrolEksisting: Data encryption, secure API, penetration testing, privacy by design
risks.verifierComment: Good privacy controls, encryption properly implemented

risks.peristiwaRisiko: App tidak kompatibel dengan berbagai device atau OS version yang menyebabkan user experience buruk
risks.sumberRisiko: OS fragmentation, Device diversity, Version compatibility, Performance variation
risks.dampakKualitatif: Poor user experience, low adoption rate, negative reviews, support burden
risks.dampakKuantitatif: Additional development cost 400 juta rupiah, support cost 100 juta/bulan
risks.kontrolEksisting: Multi-device testing, progressive enhancement, compatibility matrix, user feedback
risks.verifierComment: Comprehensive testing strategy addresses compatibility issues

risks.peristiwaRisiko: Aplikasi ditolak oleh App Store atau Play Store karena tidak memenuhi policy
risks.sumberRisiko: Store policy violation, Content guidelines, Security requirements, Review process
risks.dampakKualitatif: Launch delay, market entry postponement, competitive disadvantage
risks.dampakKuantitatif: Launch delay cost 200 juta rupiah, marketing adjustment 150 juta rupiah
risks.kontrolEksisting: Policy compliance review, pre-submission testing, store guideline adherence
risks.verifierComment: App store requirements well understood and addressed

risks.peristiwaRisiko: App performance buruk saat peak usage atau network connectivity rendah
risks.sumberRisiko: High concurrent users, Network latency, Server capacity, Database performance
risks.dampakKualitatif: User frustration, transaction abandonment, customer complaints, service reputation
risks.dampakKuantitatif: Infrastructure scaling cost 600 juta rupiah, revenue loss 300 juta/bulan
risks.kontrolEksisting: Load testing, performance monitoring, auto-scaling, offline capability, caching
risks.verifierComment: Performance optimization and scaling strategy well planned

risks.peristiwaRisiko: Kegagalan integrasi dengan third party services (payment gateway, SMS, push notification)
risks.sumberRisiko: API changes, Service downtime, Rate limiting, Authentication failure
risks.dampakKualitatif: Service disruption, feature unavailability, user experience degradation
risks.dampakKuantitatif: Alternative service cost 200 juta rupiah, integration rework 300 juta rupiah
risks.kontrolEksisting: Redundant providers, API monitoring, fallback mechanisms, SLA agreements
risks.verifierComment: Good redundancy and fallback strategy for third party dependencies

PRJ-004.overallComment: Several high-impact risks need additional mitigation controls, especially around payment security and data protection

risks.peristiwaRisiko: Fraud payment atau chargeback yang tinggi karena security vulnerability
risks.sumberRisiko: Payment vulnerability, Credit card fraud, Identity theft
risks.dampakKualitatif: Financial loss, merchant account suspension, customer distrust
risks.dampakKuantitatif: Chargeback loss 1 miliar rupiah, fraud protection cost 300 juta rupiah
risks.kontrolEksisting: SSL encryption, PCI compliance, fraud detection
risks.verifierComment: Need stronger fraud detection and real-time monitoring

risks.peristiwaRisiko: Stock out atau overselling karena real-time inventory tracking yang tidak akurat
risks.sumberRisiko: System lag, Integration delay, Manual error, Concurrent transactions
risks.dampakKualitatif: Customer dissatisfaction, order cancellation, reputation damage
risks.dampakKuantitatif: Lost sales 500 juta rupiah, compensation cost 200 juta rupiah
risks.kontrolEksisting: Real-time sync, inventory buffer, transaction locking

risks.peristiwaRisiko: Website crash atau performance buruk saat flash sale atau peak traffic
risks.sumberRisiko: High traffic volume, Server capacity, Database bottleneck, CDN capacity
risks.dampakKualitatif: Sales loss, customer frustration, brand reputation damage
risks.dampakKuantitatif: Revenue loss 2 miliar rupiah, infrastructure upgrade 800 juta rupiah
risks.kontrolEksisting: Load balancer, auto-scaling, CDN, performance monitoring
risks.verifierComment: Scalability plan needs stress testing validation

risks.peristiwaRisiko: Kebocoran data customer termasuk payment information dan personal data
risks.sumberRisiko: Security breach, Insider threat, Database vulnerability, API exposure
risks.dampakKualitatif: Legal liability, regulatory penalty, customer trust loss, business closure
risks.dampakKuantitatif: GDPR fine 5 miliar rupiah, legal cost 1 miliar rupiah, business loss 10 miliar rupiah
risks.kontrolEksisting: Data encryption, access control, security audit, penetration testing
risks.verifierComment: Need enhanced data loss prevention and monitoring

risks.peristiwaRisiko: Critical third party service downtime (payment gateway, shipping, email service)
risks.sumberRisiko: Vendor outage, Service maintenance, Contract termination, Technical issues
risks.dampakKualitatif: Service disruption, order processing halt, customer communication failure
risks.dampakKuantitatif: Revenue loss 300 juta/hari, alternative service cost 150 juta rupiah
risks.kontrolEksisting: Multiple vendor options, SLA monitoring, backup services
